name: Optimus OPT3
description: Optimus is a low-risk algorithmic trading solution that generates profits for OPT3 holders on a daily basis. Our protocol allows users to benefit from algorithmic trading without the hassle of making your own bots or using a sketchy third-party API linked to your identity on a centralized exchange. Optimus is built by the defi community for the defi community. No venture capitalists were involved in the making of this venture.
